name: Chiron Oracle Dev
postCreateCommand: cd swisseph && make clean && make CFLAGS='-O2 -fPIC' libswe.so && cc -shared -o libswe.so swedate.o swehouse.o swejpl.o swemmoon.o swemplan.o sweph.o swephlib.o swecl.o swehel.o -lm && sudo cp libswe.so /usr/local/lib/ && sudo cp swephexp.h /usr/local/include/ && sudo ldconfig
